results.title: Efficacy of Topical Cholesterol and Statin Combination Therapy in the Treatment of Porokeratosis: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: The systematic review consisted of an aggregate of 33 patients, most of whom (n=31, 93.9%) applied the treatment twice daily for an average of 9.4 weeks (median=8 weeks), with 93.9% (n=31) experiencing improvement or resolution of @<m>DISEASE_Porokeratosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@porokeratosis@@@. Sixteen patients (48.5%) used @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ and 16 (48.5%) used @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with concurrent @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Casale F, Walters N, Peach A, Dong J. Efficacy of Topical Cholesterol and Statin Combination Therapy in the Treatment of Porokeratosis: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis. J Drugs Dermatol. 2023 Dec 1;22(12):1160-1165. PMID: 38051843

results.title: Topical simvastatin-cholesterol for disseminated superficial actinic porokeratosis: An open-label, split-body clinical trial.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND/OBJECTIVES: Disseminated superficial @<m>DISEASE_Porokeratosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@actinic porokeratosis@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Porokeratosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@DSAP@@@) is a @<m>DISEASE_Porokeratosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017499 @@@porokeratosis@@@ variant that is cosmetically disfiguring and may be associated with @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Squamous_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002294 @@@squamous cell carcinoma@@@.

citations.NLM: Byth LA, Byth J. Topical simvastatin-cholesterol for disseminated superficial actinic porokeratosis: An open-label, split-body clinical trial. Australas J Dermatol. 2021 Aug;62(3):310-313. PMID: 34028808
